00020 #ifndef _POSIX_COND_H
00021 #define _POSIX_COND_H
00022 
00023 #include <pthread.h>
00024 
00025 struct cobalt_cond;
00026 struct mutex_dat;
00027 
00028 union __xeno_cond {
00029         pthread_cond_t native_cond;
00030         struct __shadow_cond {
00031                 unsigned magic;
00032                 struct cobalt_condattr attr;
00033                 struct cobalt_cond *cond;
00034                 union {
00035                         unsigned pending_signals_offset;
00036                         unsigned long *pending_signals;
00037                 };
00038                 union {
00039                         unsigned mutex_datp_offset;
00040                         struct mutex_dat *mutex_datp;
00041                 };
00042         } shadow_cond;
00043 };
00044 
00045 #define COBALT_COND_MAGIC 0x86860505
00046 
00047 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00048 
00049 #include "internal.h"
00050 
00051 struct __shadow_mutex;
00052 union __xeno_mutex;
00053 
00054 typedef struct cobalt_cond {
00055         unsigned magic;
00056         xnsynch_t synchbase;
00057         xnholder_t link;        /* Link in cobalt_condq */
00058 
00059 #define link2cond(laddr) container_of(laddr, cobalt_cond_t, link)
00060 
00061         xnholder_t mutex_link;
00062 
00063 #define mutex_link2cond(laddr) container_of(laddr, cobalt_cond_t, mutex_link)
00064 
00065         unsigned long *pending_signals;
00066         pthread_condattr_t attr;
00067         struct cobalt_mutex *mutex;
00068         cobalt_kqueues_t *owningq;
00069 } cobalt_cond_t;
00070 
00071 extern const pthread_condattr_t cobalt_default_cond_attr;
00072 
00073 static inline int cobalt_cond_deferred_signals(struct cobalt_cond *cond)
00074 {
00075         unsigned long pending_signals;
00076         int need_resched;
00077 
00078         pending_signals = *cond->pending_signals;
00079 
00080         switch(pending_signals) {
00081         default:
00082                 *cond->pending_signals = 0;
00083                 need_resched = xnsynch_wakeup_many_sleepers(&cond->synchbase,
00084                                                             pending_signals);
00085                 break;
00086 
00087         case ~0UL:
00088                 need_resched =
00089                         xnsynch_flush(&cond->synchbase, 0) == XNSYNCH_RESCHED;
00090                 *cond->pending_signals = 0;
00091                 break;
00092 
00093         case 0:
00094                 need_resched = 0;
00095                 break;
00096         }
00097 
00098         return need_resched;
00099 }
